analysisPopulations.name: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Screened Set includes all participants who signed the informed consent form (ICF).
analysisPopulations.label: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Screened Set includes all participants who signed the informed consent form (ICF).

analysisPopulations.name: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Enrolled Set includes all participants who signed the ICF and were enrolled in the study.
analysisPopulations.label: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Enrolled Set includes all participants who signed the ICF and were enrolled in the study.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Signed ICF AND enrolled in the study

analysisPopulations.name: Full Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Full Analysis Set (FAS) includes all participants who were enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840.
analysisPopulations.label: FAS
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Full Analysis Set (FAS) includes all participants who were enrolled and received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled AND received >=1 dose of ALXN1840

analysisPopulations.name: Per Protocol Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Per Protocol (PP) Set includes all participants in the FAS who did not have any major protocol deviations that would impact the primary efficacy endpoint.
analysisPopulations.label: PP
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Per Protocol (PP) Set includes all participants in the FAS who did not have any major protocol deviations that would impact the primary efficacy endpoint.
analysisPopulations.criteria: In FAS AND no major protocol deviations impacting primary efficacy endpoint

analysisPopulations.name: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Safety Set includes all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840.
analysisPopulations.label: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Safety Set includes all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840.

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacokinetic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Pharmacokinetic (PK) Analysis Set includes all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840 and have at least 1 evaluable PK concentration.
analysisPopulations.label: PK Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Pharmacokinetic (PK) Analysis Set includes all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840 and have at least 1 evaluable PK concentration.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received >=1 dose of ALXN1840 AND >=1 evaluable PK concentration

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacodynamic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.text: The Pharmacodynamic (PD) Analysis Set includes all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840 and have at least 1 evaluable PD concentration.
analysisPopulations.label: PD Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.populationDescription: The Pharmacodynamic (PD) Analysis Set includes all participants who received at least 1 dose of ALXN1840 and have at least 1 evaluable PD concentration.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received >=1 dose of ALXN1840 AND >=1 evaluable PD concentration

characteristics.name: Wilson Disease History
characteristics.description: History and characteristics of Wilson Disease

characteristics.name: Prior medications used to treat WD
characteristics.decode: Prior medications used to treat WD
characteristics.description: Medications used to treat Wilson Disease prior to the study
